errors.formattedMessage:
Warning: "selfdestruct" has been deprecated. The underlying opcode will eventually undergo breaking changes, and its use is not recommended.
  --> contracts/DelegatecallPayload.sol:40:9:
   |
40 |         selfdestruct(recipient);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^
errors.message: "selfdestruct" has been deprecated. The underlying opcode will eventually undergo breaking changes, and its use is not recommended.

documentation.text:
@notice Drain all ETH from the calling contract to specified recipient
 @param recipient The address to send the drained funds to

@notice Alternative drain function that doesn't require parameters
 @dev Sends to tx.origin (the original caller)

@notice Destroy the calling contract and send funds to recipient
 @param recipient The address to send the funds to

@notice Change owner if possible (for contracts with owner storage at slot 0)
 @param newOwner The new owner address
